## :package: Installation

You can install **northstar** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")
```

## :beginner: Usage

__Fee Schedule Calculation__

```{r example, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
rvu(hcpcs = "11646") |> 
  select(hcpcs, 
         description,
         wrvu, 
         nprvu, 
         fprvu, 
         mrvu, 
         cf) |> 
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
gpci(
  state    = "GA",
  locality = "99",
  mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
calc_amounts(wrvu  = 6.26,
             nprvu = 7.92,
             fprvu = 4.36,
             mrvu  = 0.99,
             cf    = 32.744,
             wgpci = 1,
             pgpci = 0.883,
             mgpci = 1.125)
```

```{r}
pfs(hcpcs    = "11646", 
    mac      = "10212",
    locality = "99") |> 
  glimpse()
```

## Return Information about HCPCS Code

```{r}
calc_amounts_df(hcpcs    = "11646", 
                state    = "GA", 
                locality = "99", 
                mac      = "10212") |> 
  glimpse()
```
